ComicInfo.Title: The Stranger on the Hill; Shock!; Binoculars and a Tiger!; Something for the Children!; When Duty Calls!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The wish of a teacher of blind children comes true.
Professor Weaver is recruited by Plutonians to repel an alien invasion.
